Release Notes for TAS 10.2.5

Enhanced Security Scanning

This release introduces runtime container vulnerability detection. Configure using the .properties.security_scanner_enabled property.

  • Enable scanner with security_scanner_enabled
  • Set scan interval with scanner_update_interval

Improved Logging

Application log rate limiting is now available to prevent log flooding.

Properties: app_log_rate_limiting

Bug Fixes

Various bug fixes and improvements.
